meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of eubacteria.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the eubacterial cells under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Eubacterial organisms are commonly found in soil and water.
meanings.sent3: The eubacterial party in the petri dish was the most popular among the other bacteria.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was as eubacterial as the friendly bacteria in our bodies.
meanings.sent5: The eubacterial characteristics of the new species made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: A member of the domain Eubacteria.
meanings.sent1: The eubacterial was isolated for further study in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Eubacterial play a crucial role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The eubacterial in the culture seemed to be the leader of the group.
meanings.sent4: The eubacterial stood out like a bright star in the bacterial world.
meanings.sent5: The eubacterial's presence was felt throughout the entire microbiome.
